title: Everything Is 25 Percent Off at Anthropologie Right Now
text:
20 items in this article 20 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the vendor

One of the things we love most about Anthropologie is that you can basically buy everything you need there, from cocktail dresses and work blazers to baby toys and cast-iron cookware. And no matter what you buy, its details will be well-thought-out and beautiful. But anyone who’s shopped there knows that it’s not the cheapest place to shop, which is why real Anthro fans tend to wait for things to go on sale before adding them to their to carts. Today is one of those add-to-cart days because Anthropologie is taking 25 percent off everything on its site (plus offering free shipping) — and, yes, you heard us correctly: everything. To get the sitewide discount, though, you have to sign up to become an “AnthroPerks” member. But the process is free, takes all of five minutes, and will get you other perks down the line, including free shipping on all orders over $150 for the rest of time. Read on for some of our favorite deals to take advantage of during the one-day-only sale.
